edu.upc.BDAccessRemot
Interface RemoteProxyConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
HTTPProxyConnection
public interface RemoteProxyConnection

Any class sending asynchronous responses from the HTTP Server, must implement this interface.

Method Summary
 void addListener(RemoteProxyListener listener)
          This method is used to add listeners who will be notified when a server's response arrives.
 void sendMessage(java.lang.String msg)
          Sends a message to the server.
 

Method Detail

addListener

void addListener(RemoteProxyListener listener)
This method is used to add listeners who will be notified when a server's response arrives.

Parameters:
listener - A listener who is going to be notified when a server's response arrives.

sendMessage

void sendMessage(java.lang.String msg)
Sends a message to the server.

Parameters:
msg - The message that will be sent to the server.
